extendedInfo.description: The sci-fi horror masterpiece DEAD SPACE has finally arrived on Android!This stunning vision of the Dead Space franchise is truly a landmark in mobile gaming. Featuring hardcore gameplay and a rich audio experience, immerse yourself in bloodcurdling events that unleash the Necromorph horde. Once youâve played, this sci-fi horror masterpiece will truly change the way you think about Android games.A CHARGED SENSORY EXPERIENCESurvive one of the most gripping, bone-chilling experiences on mobile. Cutting-edge visuals â rich in effects and atmospheric lighting â reproduce the cinematic horror of the console game. Featuring a fully voice-acted stereo soundtrack, plus a movie-quality score and sound effects, find yourself fully immersed in the dread of Dead Space.SHOCKINGLY EASY TO CONTROL Intuitive controls focus you on the action. The on-screen HUD is seamlessly integrated into the game. Navigate 6 varied environments and battle Necromorphs with simple swipe and tap controls.FEATURING 2 EXCLUSIVE WEAPONS & CLASSIC MODULESAccess the new Plasma Saw and Core Extractor, plus 3 more weapons from the Dead Space universe. Also utilize Kinesis and Stasis Modules well-known to players of the console game â and get on with the business of strategic dismemberment. Dare to step into DEAD SPACE? Get this critically-acclaimed horror experience on Android NOW!!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: I recommend
reviews.comment: I am a big fan of dead space and when I saw it I had to get it you get what you pay for. the games graphics are amazing and I can\'t get over how fun it is to play and I have not had any problems with the game since I got it and I love how there is auto save for the game so I can pick up where I left off. this game is the best game with the best graphics on a cell phone 5 stars.
reviews.author: John Brodnax

reviews.title: Great gaming on Android!
reviews.comment: Two thumbs up-- works great on my ZTE Avid which has a Qualcomm Adreno 225 graphics processor! Good game play and story line; highly recommended.
reviews.author: Danny Uma\303\261a

reviews.title: The Best Game So Far for Nexus 4!
reviews.comment: Great gameplay with the best controls for Nexus 4 and 7! ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please make a gamepad interface
reviews.comment: Top quality graphics, fun gameplay.  I wish they would make a configurable interface so I could use my gamepad.
reviews.author: Michael Gonzalez

reviews.title: Game broken on new device
reviews.comment: I installed it on my new phone and I get a server error 5002. The only solution I found involves copying the game\'s data files from another device and disabling radios to prevent updating (not going to happen...). Not really interested in playing games to play my EA games so I\'m going to seek a refund instead.
reviews.author: Joshua Honeycutt

reviews.comment: Needs Droid 3 Fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I want you to make another one but I dont want to pay can you make it be like a dead space with dead space 2 and 3 plz
reviews.author: losreyesguerrero

reviews.title: Heavy pulse rifle?
reviews.comment: I was reading the help to see how to do some things and I saw a heavy pulse rifle it said it is in the shop I look and didn\'t find it so how do you get the weapon on and great game :-)
reviews.author: Isaac Lopez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s fun but it\'s way to short
reviews.comment: It\'s a lot of fun to play but it ends to fast and it kinda seems like it was going to be longer but some one got in a hurry.  It\'s not bad for the price. Plays great on my note2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mind Blowing
reviews.comment: This is an insane game. I love it. Way worth the money! You should come up with some sort of survival with other people online.
reviews.author: Jarrett De Bruin

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: For the amount of money I paid for this app, it should work. Every time I open it, it freezes my whole phone and I can\'t even press the softkeys and go home/back, I have to take the battery out and restart the whole phone. Waste of money, don\'t buy this POS game.
reviews.author: Aiden Delpino

reviews.title: Won\'t run on HTC EVO LTE
reviews.comment: Worked on my HTC EVO 4G but it force quits on HTC EVO LTE, seems like its time for a patch for the new batch of phones based on other reviews. Was a good game when it worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Galaxy S4 working!  Fantastic game! Intuitive controls!  Great visuals!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Stuck in the dark when investigating reactor core. Kinda lame. Good controls. Great graphics
reviews.author: Gabriel Hotchkiss

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: It\'s moist
reviews.author: Miguel Gutierrez

reviews.title: Error code on new nexus 7
reviews.comment: Error code -24 and game some uninstalled itself and won\'t reinstall after I paid $6 for it. Crap
reviews.author: Krista Hayes

reviews.title: Great game but doesn\'t play nice with Qualcomm SoC
reviews.comment: I\'ve played this on 3 generations of devices with Qualcomm Snapdragon SoCs and all have shown constant juddering/stuttering (looks like a frame skip) while the framerate otherwise seems good.  I haven\'t seen this issue with non Qualcomm SoC and Apple devices, so I guess you guys need to optimize for increasingly prevalent Qualcomm devices.  Otherwise, great game and good execution.
reviews.author: John Gallagher

reviews.title: Needs controler
reviews.comment: Great game with great graphics.... But no abailty to use a gamepad :-( Needs updates for newer phones that can handle better graphics and Bluetooth controllers/interfaces.
reviews.author: Brandon Setzer

reviews.title: Sero 7 pro
reviews.comment: Great controls, looks and sounds awesome for a tablet game. Def worth the money
reviews.author: Jeremiah Hawkins
